mapper.select: SELECT id , name as "firstName" , relationship as "lastName" , phone as "phone" , description as "description" , create_date as "createDate" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.create_by) as "createBy" , modify_date as "modifyDate" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.modify_by) as "modifyBy" FROM family_information WHERE status = #{status};
